meanings.definition: A person who operates or works on a boat.
meanings.sent1: The boatmen skillfully navigated the river.
meanings.sent2: The boatmen loaded the cargo onto the ship.
meanings.sent3: The boatmen joked about having boat races in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: The boatmen were the unsung heroes of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The boatmen's expertise in sailing was unmatched.
